subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: The Knicks may be less woeful than their New York rivals, but they have a long way to go to match the 1990s teams that were sometimes exasperating but always exhilarating.
snippet: The Knicks may be less woeful than their New York rivals, but they have a long way to go to match the 1990s teams that were sometimes exasperating but always exhilarating.
